item.title: Player dialogue[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:7, topic:335214”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=431612.msg3168802#msg3168802 date=1270253795]

public static void sendPlrChat(String line) { sendFrame200(615, 588); sendFrame126(c.playerName, 975); sendFrame126("", 976); sendFrame126(line, 977); sendFrame185(974); sendFrame164(973); NpcDialogueSend = true; }
[/quote]
errr…
[/quote]

Sorry, fixed.

item.title: Player dialogue[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:335214”]You see your method sucks. you need to use the proper dialogues in you “client.java” or maybe “dialogue.java” (if it exists) you will need to add it there via a “case” there you can use “talk” or “talk2” to make the npc talk.

hope i explained well.[/quote]
I already know how to add npc dialogues
It’s just that i don’t know how to add player dialogues.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You see your method sucks. you need to use the proper dialogues in you “client.java” or maybe “dialogue.java” (if it exists) you will need to add it there via a “case” there you can use “talk” or “talk2” to make the npc talk.

hope i explained well.

item.title: Player dialogue[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Well i know 80% of servers have this but…
I was wondering…how do you make it so when you talk to a NPC it shows the player talking?
(for example):

(deltascape source)

EDIT:I noticed this,but what would i change?
public void talk(String text, int npc) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4884); sendFrame126(text, 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(npc, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

Read full topic
